content: keep your hands cozy with these cute arrow mitts starting with a generous 1x1 ribbed cuff you ll increase for the thumb gusset then follow an easy 5 row repeat with crossed stitches to create a 3 dimensional motif size one size fits most teen / adult women *sample charted fits hand that s 7 75 long with 8 circumference yarn approximately 250 yds of sport weight yarn gauge 14 sts x 19 row = 2 in stockinette stitch after blocking notions us3 / 3 25mm 32 or 40 circular needle stitch markers darning needle scissors scrap yarn
